intro: Mapania simplex, commonly known as the simple mapania, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens and as a decorative plant.
